column5: Anybody know a good place to find tires at a good price. I checked princess auto and they want $115 each with the rim and TSC and CT have just the tire for $100, I just need the tires. I'm hoping to find them cheaper than that somewhere.  Let me know if you know a place  Thanks, Dan
Found some in Rhode Island for $30 !!
Can you get them for me
Best I found so far is in California.. on 5 bolt rims they are $70 each.. down to 60 or so with volume. $100 looks like a common price everywhere else..

I was fortunate. My steel wheels were getting a little rusty and I talked to a friend who owns AM Distribution. He gave me 3 13" great quality tires mounted on beauty galvanized wheels, wheel locks, ballmount with lock and a 2" ball for $300.

I picked up a pair last year(tire and white  rim carlisle st 175 80 D 13)  for my boat trailer paid 50 bucks each brand new at a trailer place in Brantford.I can't recall the name of the place but they always advertise in the triad.
